short_summary: Scheduled maintenance of aids to navigation on Lake Winnipegosis
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada, the Canadian Coast Guard, has obligation to establish aids to navigation and maintain waterways, with the purpose of ensuring safety on waterways. The Canadian Coast Guard maintains a Seasonal Aids to Navigation System on Lake Winnipegosis, Manitoba, which includes lighted and unlighted buoys.
full_summary:
### Installation and Servicing of Aids to Navigation on Lake Winnipegosis

#### Background

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), a branch of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, is responsible for establishing and maintaining aids to navigation on our waterways. This aids to navigation system assists vessels to navigate safely and ensures the public's right to navigate.

#### Contract Description

The contract involves the installation and servicing of buoys on Lake Winnipegosis, Manitoba. The contract period is one year, commencing from April 1st, 2023 to March 31st, 2024, with the option to renew the contract for three additional one-year periods.

#### Location of Work

The work will be conducted on Lake Winnipegosis, Manitoba.

#### Contract Period

The contract period is one year. Option to renew the contract for three additional one-year periods if mutually agreed upon between the contractor and the Department of Fisheries and Oceans.

#### Security Requirements

There are no security requirements for this contract.

#### Deliverables

* Installation and servicing of 15 lighted buoys and 52 unlighted buoys on Lake Winnipegosis.
* Regular monthly inspections of buoys to ensure correct position.
* Removal and storage of buoys at the end of navigation season.

#### Procurement Method

**Competitive - Open Bidding**

#### Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Notice

The due date for submission of tenders is April 4th, 2023, at 1:30 PM.

Please visit the following link for more information and attachments: [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/23/d35f08c7cf8d19b4b94e8b0e0e91b569/30003284_-_attachment_1_-_annexe_1
